txt.en:
'We need to learn who leads the force at Barad Morlas. Until their leader is slain, the half-orcs will continue their efforts there, undaunted.

'Go to Barad Morlas, [placeholder], and collect several of the banners the half-orcs have raised there. Amidst those tattered banners may be a clue as to the identity of their leader.

'The banners have been raised throughout Barad Morlas, south-west of here. Hurry now, [placeholder]...time is running short.'
'These banners will do nicely, [placeholder]. I should be able to learn the identity of the half-orcs' leaders with little difficulty.'
'Were you not able to find any banners at Barad Morlas, [placeholder]? I find that difficult to believe....'
You thinned the ranks of the half-orcs at Barad Morlas, but Lengliel warned you that would not be enough.
Talk to Lengliel at Echad Eregion

Tattered White Hand Banners can be found throughout the ruins of Barad Morlas, south-west of Echad Eregion. Lengliel is at Echad Eregion, north-east of Barad Morlas.\n\nLengliel has asked you to help her determine the identity of the half-orcs' leader by collecting banners from the ruins of Barad Morlas.
